relation: 20" Gold Wedding & Party Sparklers THE MOST POPULAR SPARKLER FOR WEDDINGS & PARTIES #20 Sparklers are the most popular sparklers used in weddings and parties in the US. 20-inch gold sparklers burn for 80-120 seconds, which is enough time for all your guests to light their sparklers and have them burning at the same time when the bride and groom leave. Click here for more... Must Ship Ground or 3-Day. Cannot be Shipped Overnight or 2-Day

Sparklers, 14 inch Gold, steel wire GREAT FOR WEDDINGS, LONG BURN TIME 14 inch sparklers are great sparklers for wedding or party favors. They last long enough for everyone to light up at the same time, and they're light enough for guest to be able to hold easily. Their sturdy metal stick make them great for guests to wave through the air. They burn for approximately 70 seconds, plenty of time for guests to enjoy and to get lots of pictures. They have a special primer on the tip to make them easy to light. Be sure you order enough to test-light before the event. 9 packs of 8 sparklers, for a total of 72 sparklers. Price: $0.23 each. *Packaging may differ from the image. Ground Shipping Only - No Air or Overnight

Campfire Blue Mystical Fire COLORED FLAMES FOR YOUR CAMPFIRE This product will change any wood burning fire to shades of blue, green, and purple. In order to do so, throw 2 or 3 packages into the fire. Ground Shipping Only - No Air or Overnight

Wedding Confetti Poppers GREAT FOR WEDDING PARTIES & RECEPTIONS Wedding Confetti Poppers shoot white paper streamers from a white plastic "champagne bottle." Ground Shipping Only - No Air or Overnight

Smoke Crackers, Colored THREE BRIGHT COLORS This product is great in daylight! There are three bright smoke colors per pack. They burn for approximately 5-10 seconds. Ground Shipping Only - No Air or Overnight

Pistol Popper GREAT PARTY FUN! You hold a Magnum pistol popper and just pull the trigger. It pops and throws out colored confetti and paper streamers. Same kind of pull-string item as "champagne poppers", but more fun to use because you can do it with one hand. One box of 36. Ground Shipping Only - No Air or Overnight
